Key Match Events: Lane Thomas doubled off the left-field wall
Jhonkensy Noel followed with his seismic home run
Aaron Judge's laser-beam homer off Emmanuel Clase tied the score in the eighth
Giancarlo Stanton followed with a go-ahead shot
Post-Match Reflections: David Fry’s two-run blast off Clay Holmes in the 10th inning will stand as one of the grandest moments in the history of the franchise
Aaron Judge expressed pride in the team’s resilience after the comeback win
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Guardians could have — and maybe should have — won Game 2, when so much went right for them but they still couldn’t even the series
Others: The Yankees still have the series lead, with two more games here and two more, if necessary, in the Bronx
The Guardians will turn to Gavin Williams (3-10, 4.86) in Game 4 and perhaps Ben Lively, who was left off the roster until Alex Cobb’s back injury, in Game 5
